game.title: IoT Strategy Sprint
game.subtitle: Learn IoT fundamentals through strategic decision-making

onboarding.title: Welcome to IoT Strategy Sprint
onboarding.intro: You are the Director of IoT Strategy for BrightWorks Operations. Your mission: use IoT to make the organization faster, greener, and saferâ€”without creating complexity.

sense.title: Sense
sense.description: Devices collect data from the environment

iotProcess.cardFitsIn: See where {{cardTitle}} fits in the IoT process loop
iotProcess.highlightedStages: Highlighted stages show which parts of the IoT process this initiative uses
iotProcess.dialogDescription: Understanding how IoT initiatives map to the fundamental sense-share-process-act loop helps you see the bigger picture.

disasters.ransomwareAttack: Your IoT network was hit by a ransomware attack. Inadequate security hardening left devices vulnerable. Operations were disrupted for days, costing significant efficiency and increasing complexity as you scramble to patch systems.

premortem.title: Pre-Mortem Reflection
premortem.description: Before seeing your final results, take a moment to think critically about your strategy.
premortem.prompt: Looking back at your 3-year IoT journey, what do you think was your biggest risk or vulnerability?

securityRisk.label: Security & Complexity Risk
securityRisk.description: I may have deployed too many IoT devices without adequate security measures, creating vulnerabilities.

inefficiency.label: Inefficiency & Missed Opportunities
inefficiency.description: I focused too much on one area and missed opportunities to improve throughput and operations.

environmentalFine.label: Environmental Compliance Risk
environmentalFine.description: I didn't invest enough in sustainability, leaving us exposed to regulations and fines.

RESILIENT_OPERATOR.title: Resilient Operator
RESILIENT_OPERATOR.description: You managed trade-offs skillfully, improving multiple dimensions without creating dangerous complexity.
RESILIENT_OPERATOR.suggestions: You showed excellent judgment in managing competing priorities.
